author: Brian Flood
title: Facebook won't allow promotion of protests 'that defy government's guidance' on social distancing
description: Facebook has banned pages promoting protests of stay-at-home mandates and policies that challenge the government's advice about social distancing amid the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
